Title: Relates to domestic violence training for health and mental health professionals
Summary: Relates to domestic violence training for health and mental health professionals; requires such trainings to be updated annually by the commissioner of health in consultation with the office for the prevention of domestic violence; requires the commissioner of health to collect data on participation of such trainings by health professionals.
LawCode: Amd ยง206, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to domestic violence training for health and mental health professionals
